text: Achlya tateyamai is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Inoue in 1982. It is found in Japan (Hokkaido)., 1982, in Inoue et al. Moths of Japan 1: 424; pl. 228, figs. 45, 46. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1982 Category:Thyatirinae Category:Moths of Japan
title: Achlya tateyamai
